newsitem.title: INDIA: Thirty-five drown in Indian lorry accident.
newsitem.headline: Thirty-five drown in Indian lorry accident.

text.p: Thiry-five people in a wedding party drowned when a lorry they were travelling in plunged into a river in the southern Indian state of Andhra Pradesh, police said on Sunday.
Police said the accident occurred on Saturday when the lorry, carrying about 70 people, fell off a bridge, 400 km (250 miles) south of Hyderabad, the state capital.
Further details were not immediately available.
